Parā°，（prefix） [para+ā，not Instr．of para：see para 2 c； in some cases it may also correspond to paraṁ°] prep．meaning “on to，” “over” （with the idea of mastering），also “through，throughout．” The ā is shortened before double consonant，like parā+kṛ=parakkaroti，parā+ kram=parakkamati （see under cpds．of para）．（Page 420）
